sql.query: INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) SELECT 'googlescholarplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', p.press_id FROM presses p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ps.plugin_name FROM plugin_settings ps WHERE ps.plugin_name = 'googlescholarplugin' AND ps.context_id = p.press_id)
